name: Quest for the magic Bogroll
description:
Go on a wonderful journey of to find magic toilet paper in this completely normal game-jam platformer!

Controls:

  • A / Left Arrow = Move left
  • D / Right Arrow = Move right
  • W / Up Arrow / Space = Jump
  •  S / Down Arrow = Ground Pound
  • ESC - Restart level

Music:

"Four Beers' Polka" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
